pullRequest.title: Jakarta Concurrency with Jakarta Enterprise Beans
pullRequest.bodyText: Update Concurrency EJB test to run with Jakarta Enterprise Beans.  I was going to switch the bucket entirely to Jakarta, until the tests surfaced a missing autofeature for Jakarta.  If this is the only bucket that runs that code path, then it could be valuable to have the test running against both Java EE and Jakarta EE, to guard against regressions to this autofeature.

commit.message: Issue #11329 test Jakarta Concurrency with Jakarta Enterprise Beans
Issue #11329 code review comment to remove unnecessary code
